arStrings.szText: {c_highlight}Vaults{/c} have permanently opened. You can enter these treasure-filled dungeons from the surface, through portals in the Gatehall, or using {c_highlight}Nightmare Vault Sigils.{/c}
{c_highlight}Vaults{/c} have permanently opened. You can enter these treasure-filled dungeons from the surface, through portals in the Gatehall, or using {c_highlight}Nightmare Vault Sigils.{/c}
{c_highlight}Vaults{/c} also grant {c_highlight}Zoltun's Warding{/c}, a buff that unlocks bonus loot!
{c_highlight}Vaults{/c} also grant {c_highlight}Zoltun's Warding{/c}, a buff that unlocks bonus loot!
Offer {c_highlight}Pearls of Warding{/c} to the Statue of Zoltun Kulle to earn charges of {c_highlight}Zoltun's Warding{/c}.
Offer {c_highlight}Pearls of Warding{/c} to the Statue of Zoltun Kulle to earn charges of {c_highlight}Zoltun's Warding{/c}.
Complete {c_highlight}Vaults{/c} and defeat {c_highlight}Heralds of Malphas{/c} to earn more {c_highlight}Pearls of Warding{/c}.
Complete {c_highlight}Vaults{/c} and defeat {c_highlight}Heralds of Malphas{/c} to earn more {c_highlight}Pearls of Warding{/c}.
